definitions.definition: a warm-blooded egg-laying vertebrate distinguished by the possession of feathers, wings, and a beak and (typically) by being able to fly.
examples: fowl; Morechick, fledgling, nestling; informalfeathered friend, birdie; budgie; technicalavifauna "feeding the birds"Morechick, fledgling, nestling; feathered friend, birdie; budgie; avifauna feeding the birds

definitions.definition: an aircraft, spacecraft, satellite, or guided missile.
examples: the crews worked frantically to ready their birds for flight

definitions.definition: a person of a specified kind or character.
examples: I'm a pretty tough old bird
